description: This name is used by many German organ builders for a Posaune that appears in the pedal.
examplesDescription: Osiris contains three dozen examples of Posaunenbass at 16' pitch, seven examples at 32' pitch, and seven examples of Posaunbass at 16' pitch. The oldest ones are given below.

examples.name: Posaunenbass 32', 16', Pedalwerk; St. Jakobi, Hamburg, Germany; Schnitger 1693. Another source spells these examples Posaune; we do not know which is correct.
Posaunbass 16', Pedal; Ochsenhausen, Baden-Württemburg, German; Gabler 1755.
